content: Hey compiler team! I'm currently updating some old documentation in the rustc-dev-guide (some of it is several years old!), but there are several parts that I'm not knowledgeable about. I would appreciate if you could take a look at the PR; I left some comments at the parts I'm not sure about: https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-dev-guide/pull/1048#pullrequestreview-583792814

The parts are related to:

  • the query system
  • WG-parallel-compiler
  • revisions in the testsuite
  • type inference variables

I resolved most of the questions, really the only one left is about type inference variables. This is the part in question: https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-dev-guide/pull/1048#discussion_r570530545
Would appreciate if someone knowledgeable about type inference could take a quick look :)
